parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the given indexed exit in a building. The returned value is in format Position.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> building '''buildingExit''' index

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> building: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_building buildingExit 0</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[buildingPos]], [[BIS_fnc_buildingPositions]]
</value></part></template>
